{{Description|The wise once debated wisdom in this corner of the ancient city, outlining the desert king's dream. After the bubble burst, this place became a secret holding cell for prisoners. Today, it has become a hotbed of monsters, but there are also treasures of the past to be found here.}}
'''Red Desert Threshold''' is a [[One-Time Domain]] located in [[Abdju Pit]] [[Great Red Sand]], [[Sumeru]]. There is only one level, '''Edge of the End'''

To be able to access the Domain, it is required to start the [[Golden Slumber]] world quest by talking to [[Bonifaz]] in [[Aaru Village]].
